name: Nonnen & Spionnen
description:
Nonnen & Spionnen, or Nuns & Spies, is a VR escape room where the player takes on the role of a female spy during the first world war. You will need to gather clues about German whereabouts, lead a wounded British soldier to safety and forge a passport to escape.

It was made at DAE Howest, by five talented people (mentioned at the end of the video), for a research project of Scan4Stories.

https://en.scan4stories.be/

Their mission is to find a way for people to immerse themselves in the past.

Special thanks to the people to the people of the Wintertuin at Sint-Katelijne Waver, for letting us visit and to the people of Flanders Field Museum and 'Koninklijk Museum van het Leger en de Krijgsgeschiedenis' to provide us with the necessary reference material.
